tool_description: Analyzes and optimizes the visual hierarchy of resume elements to ensure proper information flow and emphasis on key content.

content_sections.description: List of content sections to analyze

priority_sections.description: Sections that should receive highest visual priority

hierarchy_style.description: Hierarchy emphasis approach: subtle, moderate, or strong

error_messages: Invalid layout structure: Provide valid layout structure from layout designer.
Insufficient content sections: Provide at least 2 content sections for hierarchy analysis.
Priority section mismatch: Priority sections must be included in content sections list.
Invalid hierarchy style: Use one of [subtle, moderate, strong].
usage: Provide layout structure and content sections, optionally specify priority sections and hierarchy style. Returns visual hierarchy recommendations with implementation guidelines.

hierarchy_recommendations.description: Ordered list of visual hierarchy adjustments

emphasis_techniques.description: Recommended techniques for creating visual emphasis
